name: Isekai
description:
My demo is more than 1GB so if you would like to download please go to my dropbox 

👇👇👇Game Download 👇👇👇https://www.dropbox.com/s/w5h3g0y2y5gkkjv/Isekai%20v0.01.rar?dl=0

Current Build:

This is my first build where I plan to keep iterating on. The purpose of this if for anyone who seems interested in the project to test out the controls, core game mechanics and give feedback (please give feedback )😅

I plan to take your feedback and plan to keep iterating on this current build making it better. I plan to have an update a month with new changes big and small.

🕹️🕹️🕹️GAME FEATURES🕹️🕹️🕹️

  • Training Mode - Get use to the controls and the flow of the game in this mode where you can train against a dummy
  • Floor 1 (😄 Isekai joke) - Put what you learned to the test in this mode where you have to survive 20 waves of enemies.
  • Use your Trigger to get an extra boost of power 🔌 to destroy your enemies.
  • Stylish combat with input cancels. You are able to cancel any combat attack and movement into eachother.

👇👇👇Follow along with my devlog👇👇👇
